column4: Now I'm running Skype and Empathy and they don't appear anywhere on the panel, any ieas what am I missing?
did you just installed them? in that case log out and log in
no, I haven't. They are not missing, from the menu, they are missing from the tray bar while running.
delete .gnome and .gnome2 that will lost saved password, theme etc but may solve the issue.
